publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-533 Mr Andy Kerr: Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2003 Amendment (No.2) Order 2003-That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2003 Amendment (No.2) Order 2003 be approved. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
